pullrequest.title: Upload coverage to Codecov with Pipelines

content.raw:
It looks like we also need to install `curl` with the new image, the report is not being updated:

`bash: curl: command not found`

Also, when I try locally codecov says the report is missing. I think we need to change `CodeCoverage.cmake` so it doesn't delete `coverage.info`. That is what is done on ign-gui. I'll do this right now.
content.html:
It looks like we also need to install curl with the new image, the report is not being updated:

bash: curl: command not found

Also, when I try locally codecov says the report is missing. I think we need to change CodeCoverage.cmake so it doesn't delete coverage.info. That is what is done on ign-gui. I'll do this right now.

pullrequest.title: Upload coverage to Codecov with Pipelines

content.raw:
Ok, it's all in place now. The problem is that now the coverage is not 100% anymore, there is a line in Quaternion which it says is not hit:

https://codecov.io/bb/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/2ca2624f52552e21183f2203704fd158c49072d6/include/ignition/math/Quaternion.hh#L353

It looks like a mistake, what do you think @scpeters ?
